name: Space Brains
description:
Space Brains is a simple 2d endless arcade game, where you can shoot alien creatures with a laser. Avoid the tentacles and pick up space brain to activate your laser attack and heal yourself. See how long you can last in this unfriendly cosmic environment.

The game originates from Mini Jame Gam #15 - it was reworked and polished. As it is my first fully made game I would be grateful for any comments with your impressions and advices.

Press LMB in menu to start

  • A / D : move left / right
  • Space : jump
  • Hold LMB : aim
  • Release LMB: shoot

Font used from dafont.com (Pixeled by OmegaPC777)

Some audio effects used from freesound.org
